roleset.name: give an answer, reply

example.name: Arg 1 only
example.text: After the company reported red ink for the fiscal third quarter , Wang 's marketing department provided the sales force answers to questions such as `` How could you not have known you were going to lose $ 55 million ? '' and `` Is Wang still a viable company ? ''
example.arg: to questions such as `` How could you not have known you were going to lose $ 55 million ? '' and `` Is Wang still a viable company ?

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb answer.01, OntoNotes grouping answer-n senses 1, 2, 3, 4, & 5; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: They liked the candidate's answers to most of the debate questions.
example.arg: to most of the debate questions.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mill worked hard to defend his answer of equality to the Woman Question.
